verses.verse: ה֚וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe אֲרִיאֵ֣ל <S%H740><s%> to Ariel אֲרִיאֵ֔ל <S%H740><s%> to Ariel קִרְיַ֖ת <S%H7151><s%> the city חָנָ֣ה <S%H2583><s%> dwelt דָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> [where] David סְפ֥וּ <S%H5595><s%> add שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> ye year עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> to year חַגִּ֥ים <S%H2282><s%> sacrifices יִנְקֹֽפוּ׃ <S%H5362><s%> let them kill

וַהֲצִיק֖וֹתִי <S%H6693><s%> Yet I will distress לַֽאֲרִיאֵ֑ל <S%H740><s%> Ariel וְהָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become תַֽאֲנִיָּה֙ <S%H8386><s%> and there shall be heaviness וַֽאֲנִיָּ֔ה <S%H592><s%> and sorrow וְהָ֥יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> become לִּ֖י כַּאֲרִיאֵֽל׃ <S%H740><s%> and it shall be unto me as Ariel

וְחָנִ֥יתִי <S%H2583><s%> And I will camp כַדּ֖וּר <S%H1754><s%> against thee round about עָלָ֑יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> against וְצַרְתִּ֤י <S%H6696><s%> and will lay siege עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5921><s%> against מֻצָּ֔ב <S%H4674><s%> against thee with a mount וַהֲקִֽימֹתִ֥י <S%H6965><s%> and I will raise עָלַ֖יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> against מְצֻרֹֽת׃ <S%H4694><s%> forts

וְשָׁפַלְתְּ֙ <S%H8213><s%> And thou shalt be brought down מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the ground תְּדַבֵּ֔רִי <S%H1696><s%> [and] shalt speak וּמֵֽעָפָ֖ר <S%H6083><s%> out of the dust תִּשַּׁ֣ח <S%H7817><s%> shall be low אִמְרָתֵ֑ךְ <S%H565><s%> and thy speech וְֽ֠הָיָה <S%H1961><s%> become כְּא֤וֹב <S%H178><s%> shall be as of one that hath a familiar spirit מֵאֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> out of the ground קוֹלֵ֔ךְ <S%H6963><s%> and thy voice וּמֵעָפָ֖ר <S%H6083><s%> out of the dust אִמְרָתֵ֥ךְ <S%H565><s%> and thy speech תְּצַפְצֵֽף׃ <S%H6850><s%> shall whisper

וְהָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> will become כְּאָבָ֥ק <S%H80><s%> dust דַּ֖ק <S%H1851><s%> shall be like small הֲמ֣וֹן <S%H1995><s%> Moreover the multitude זָרָ֑יִךְ <S%H2114><s%> of thy strangers וּכְמֹ֤ץ <S%H4671><s%> [shall be] as chaff עֹבֵר֙ <S%H5674><s%> that passeth away הֲמ֣וֹן <S%H1995><s%> and the multitude עָֽרִיצִ֔ים <S%H6184><s%> of the terrible ones וְהָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> will happen לְפֶ֥תַע <S%H6621><s%> yea it shall be at an instant פִּתְאֹֽם׃ <S%H6597><s%> suddenly

מֵעִ֨ם <S%H5973><s%> From יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts תִּפָּקֵ֔ד <S%H6485><s%> Thou shalt be visited בְּרַ֥עַם <S%H7482><s%> with thunder וּבְרַ֖עַשׁ <S%H7494><s%> and with earthquake וְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> noise גָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> and great סוּפָה֙ <S%H5492><s%> with storm וּסְעָרָ֔ה <S%H5591><s%> and tempest וְלַ֖הַב <S%H3851><s%> and the flame אֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire אוֹכֵלָֽה׃ <S%H398><s%> of devouring

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become כַּֽחֲלוֹם֙ <S%H2472><s%> her shall be as a dream חֲז֣וֹן <S%H2377><s%> vision לַ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> of a night הֲמוֹן֙ <S%H1995><s%> And the multitude כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> of all the nations הַצֹּבְאִ֖ים <S%H6633><s%> that fight עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against אֲרִיאֵ֑ל <S%H740><s%> against Ariel וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all צֹבֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H6633><s%> war וּמְצֹ֣דָתָ֔הּ <S%H4685><s%> against her and her munition וְהַמְּצִיקִ֖ים <S%H6693><s%> and that distress לָֽהּ׃

וְהָיָ֡ה <S%H1961><s%> become כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> or as when יַחֲלֹ֨ם <S%H2492><s%> [man] dreameth הָרָעֵ֜ב <S%H7457><s%> It shall even be as when an hungry וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אוֹכֵ֗ל <S%H398><s%> and behold he eateth וְהֵקִיץ֮ <S%H6974><s%> but he awaketh וְרֵיקָ֣ה <S%H7386><s%> is empty נַפְשׁוֹ֒ <S%H5315><s%> and his soul וְכַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יַחֲלֹ֤ם <S%H2492><s%> dreameth הַצָּמֵא֙ <S%H6771><s%> a thirsty man וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold שֹׁתֶ֔ה <S%H8354><s%> and behold he drinketh וְהֵקִיץ֙ <S%H6974><s%> but he awaketh וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold עָיֵ֔ף <S%H5889><s%> and behold [he is] faint וְנַפְשׁ֖וֹ <S%H5315><s%> and his soul שׁוֹקֵקָ֑ה <S%H8264><s%> hath appetite כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> Thus יִֽהְיֶ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become הֲמוֹן֙ <S%H1995><s%> so shall the multitude כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> of all the nations הַצֹּבְאִ֖ים <S%H6633><s%> be that fight עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> against mount צִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> Zion ס

הִתְמַהְמְה֣וּ <S%H4102><s%> Stay וּתְמָ֔הוּ <S%H8539><s%> yourselves and wonder הִשְׁתַּֽעַשְׁע֖וּ <S%H8173><s%> cry ye out וָשֹׁ֑עוּ <S%H8173><s%> and cry שָֽׁכְר֣וּ <S%H7937><s%> they are drunken וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יַ֔יִן <S%H3196><s%> but not with wine נָע֖וּ <S%H5128><s%> they stagger וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not שֵׁכָֽר׃ <S%H7941><s%> but not with strong drink

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נָסַ֨ךְ <S%H5258><s%> hath poured out עֲלֵיכֶ֤ם <S%H5921><s%> over יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> upon you the spirit תַּרְדֵּמָ֔ה <S%H8639><s%> of deep sleep וַיְעַצֵּ֖ם <S%H6105><s%> and hath closed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵֽינֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5869><s%> your eyes אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּבִיאִ֛ים <S%H5030><s%> the prophets וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רָאשֵׁיכֶ֥ם <S%H7218><s%> and your rulers הַחֹזִ֖ים <S%H2374><s%> the seers כִּסָּֽה׃ <S%H3680><s%> hath he covered

וַתְּהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֜ם חָז֣וּת <S%H2380><s%> And the vision הַכֹּ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> the entire כְּדִבְרֵי֮ <S%H1697><s%> of all is become unto you as the words הַסֵּ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> of a book הֶֽחָתוּם֒ <S%H2856><s%> that is sealed אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִתְּנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> which [men] deliver אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹדֵ֥עַ <S%H3045><s%> to one that is learned [הַסֵּפֶר כ] (סֵ֛פֶר <S%H5612><s%> book ק) לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saying קְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> Read נָא־ <S%H4994><s%> Please זֶ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְאָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> this I pray thee and he saith לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אוּכַ֔ל <S%H3201><s%> I cannot כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for חָת֖וּם <S%H2856><s%> for it [is] sealed הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְנִתַּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> is delivered הַסֵּ֗פֶר <S%H5612><s%> And the book עַל֩ <S%H5921><s%> unto אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot יָדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> I am not learned סֵ֛פֶר <S%H5612><s%> the book לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saying קְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> Read נָא־ <S%H4994><s%> Please זֶ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְאָמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> this I pray thee and he saith לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יָדַ֖עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> acknowledge סֵֽפֶר׃ <S%H5612><s%> the book ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲדֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> Wherefore the Lord יַ֚עַן <S%H3282><s%> Forasmuch כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for נִגַּשׁ֙ <S%H5066><s%> draw near הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> as this people הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this בְּפִ֤יו <S%H6310><s%> [me] with their mouth וּבִשְׂפָתָיו֙ <S%H8193><s%> and with their lips כִּבְּד֔וּנִי <S%H3513><s%> do honour וְלִבּ֖וֹ <S%H3820><s%> their heart רִחַ֣ק <S%H7368><s%> far מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at וַתְּהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> consists יִרְאָתָם֙ <S%H3373><s%> afraid אֹתִ֔י <S%H853><s%> מִצְוַ֥ת <S%H4687><s%> by the precept אֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> he מְלֻמָּדָֽה׃ <S%H3925><s%> toward me is taught

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> behold יוֹסִ֛ף <S%H3254><s%> Therefore behold I will proceed לְהַפְלִ֥יא <S%H6381><s%> to do a marvellous work אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for הָֽעָם־ <S%H5971><s%> among this people הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this הַפְלֵ֣א <S%H6381><s%> [even] a marvellous work וָפֶ֑לֶא <S%H6382><s%> and a wonder וְאָֽבְדָה֙ <S%H6><s%> [men] shall perish חָכְמַ֣ת <S%H2451><s%> for the wisdom חֲכָמָ֔יו <S%H2450><s%> of their wise וּבִינַ֥ת <S%H998><s%> and the understanding נְבֹנָ֖יו <S%H995><s%> of their prudent תִּסְתַּתָּֽר׃ <S%H5641><s%> [men] shall be hid ס

ה֛וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe הַמַּעֲמִיקִ֥ים <S%H6009><s%> unto them that seek deep מֵֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD לַסְתִּ֣ר <S%H5641><s%> to hide עֵצָ֑ה <S%H6098><s%> their counsel וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> are in בְמַחְשָׁךְ֙ <S%H4285><s%> are in the dark מַֽעֲשֵׂיהֶ֔ם <S%H4639><s%> and their works וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> and they say מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who רֹאֵ֖נוּ <S%H7200><s%> Who seeth וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who יוֹדְעֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H3045><s%> us? and who knoweth

הַ֨פְכְּכֶ֔ם <S%H2017><s%> Surely your turning of things upside down אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo כְּחֹ֥מֶר <S%H2563><s%> clay הַיֹּצֵ֖ר <S%H3335><s%> as the potter's יֵֽחָשֵׁ֑ב <S%H2803><s%> shall be esteemed כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> would יֹאמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> say מַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <S%H4639><s%> for shall the work לְעֹשֵׂ֙הוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> of him that made לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> has no עָשָׂ֔נִי <S%H6213><s%> it He made וְיֵ֛צֶר <S%H3336><s%> me not? or shall the thing framed אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> say לְיוֹצְר֖וֹ <S%H3335><s%> of him that framed לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> has no הֵבִֽין׃ <S%H995><s%> it He had no understanding

הֲלוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> yet מְעַ֣ט <S%H4592><s%> little while מִזְעָ֔ר <S%H4213><s%> [Is] it not yet a very וְשָׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> shall be turned לְבָנ֖וֹן <S%H3844><s%> and Lebanon לַכַּרְמֶ֑ל <S%H3759><s%> into a fruitful field וְהַכַּרְמֶ֖ל <S%H3759><s%> and the fruitful field לַיַּ֥עַר <S%H3293><s%> comb יֵחָשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H2803><s%> shall be esteemed

וְשָׁמְע֧וּ <S%H8085><s%> hear בַיּוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> And in that day הַה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הַחֵרְשִׁ֖ים <S%H2795><s%> shall the deaf דִּבְרֵי־ <S%H1697><s%> the words סֵ֑פֶר <S%H5612><s%> of the book וּמֵאֹ֣פֶל <S%H652><s%> out of obscurity וּמֵחֹ֔שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> and out of darkness עֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> and the eyes עִוְרִ֖ים <S%H5787><s%> of the blind תִּרְאֶֽינָה׃ <S%H7200><s%> shall see

וְיָסְפ֧וּ <S%H3254><s%> also shall increase עֲנָוִ֛ים <S%H6035><s%> The meek בַּֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD שִׂמְחָ֑ה <S%H8057><s%> [their] joy וְאֶבְיוֹנֵ֣י <S%H34><s%> and the poor אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> among men בִּקְד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> in the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יָגִֽילוּ׃ <S%H1523><s%> shall rejoice

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אָפֵ֥ס <S%H656><s%> is brought to nought עָרִ֖יץ <S%H6184><s%> For the terrible one וְכָ֣לָה <S%H3615><s%> is consumed לֵ֑ץ <S%H3887><s%> and the scorner וְנִכְרְת֖וּ <S%H3772><s%> are cut off כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שֹׁ֥קְדֵי <S%H8245><s%> and all that watch אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> for iniquity
